Class LinearDiscriminantAnalysis

  • java.lang.Object
    • shared.filt.LinearDiscriminantAnalysis
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DataSetFilter, ReversibleFilter

    public class LinearDiscriminantAnalysis
extends java.lang.Object
implements ReversibleFilter
    A filter that performs fisher linear discriminant analysis on a data set

    1.0
    Author:
    Andrew Guillory gtg008g@mail.gatech.edu
